params._data: Optional data passed to the `PermissionCondition` implementation.
params._where: The address of the target contract.
params._who: The address (EOA or contract) for which the permission are checked.

returns.allowed: Returns true if the call is permitted.

isGranted(address,address,bytes32,bytes).notice: This method is used to check if a call is permitted.
